For Offshore processing

Refugees arrving by boat should be processed offshore.
  • Selected votes
  • Details of votes

These are the divisions (votes in Australia’s Parliament) that related to the policy “Offshore processing”. Compare how a supporter of the policy would have voted to the division outcome.

14 Mar 2013, Senate Motions — Renewable Energy Certificates - Division No. 1

Supporters vote “No (strong)”

6 Dec 2006 at 19:29, Representatives Prohibition of Human Cloning for Reproduction and the Regulation of Human Embryo Research Amendment Bill 2006 — Consideration in Detail - Division No. 3

Supporters vote “No”

About the Project

The Public Whip is brought to you by the not-for-profit OpenAustralia Foundation. It is based on the UK site of the same name.

If you'd like to talk to us about the project, please email us.
